welcome2: A passionate web and game developer, driven by a lifelong fascination with technology and the thrill of problem-solving. I find immense joy in creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences and captivating game environments.
aboutme2: I am a web and game developer based in the Greater Toronto Area. I have a passion for creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences and captivating game environments. I am a graduate of the Game Development program at George Brown College, and I am currently working as a freelance web developer.
aboutme3: I am a lifelong learner, and I am always looking for new opportunities to expand my skillset. I am currently learning React, and I am looking forward to learning more about the MERN stack.
aboutme4: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, reading, and spending time with my family.
